description: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 started for all users on Thursday, May 1, at noon. The e-commerce giant opened the sale exclusively for Prime members at midnight of the same day, providing early access to deals and discounts. The platform-wide sale brings discounts on a wide range of products across all categories.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025: Best Laptop Deals for Students

description: Archaeologists discovered Prince Userefre’s tomb, son of King Userkaf, at Saqqara, featuring a monumental pink granite false door and important Fifth Dynasty artifacts.
title: Archaeologists Discover 4,400-Year-Old Tomb of Egyptian Prince in Saqqara

description: Firefly Aerospace’s Blue Ghost Moon Lander uncovered unexpected hard rock formations and extreme lunar heat variations during its mission. These discoveries provide critical insights for improving future lunar landers. As Firefly prepares for its annual moon missions, the lessons learnt from Blue Ghost's successes will guide robotics and human operations across both the near and far sides of the moon.
title: Firefly’s Blue Ghost Moon Lander Mission Unveils Surprising Discoveries on the Lunar Surface

description: NASA’s HALO module, a key element of the Artemis Gateway, has arrived at Northrop Grumman in Arizona for final outfitting. The module will support astronauts with living and working spaces in lunar orbit. Outfitting includes critical systems for power, life support, and communications, marking a major milestone toward NASA’s long-term lunar missions and sustained deep space exploration.
title: NASA’s Lunar Space Station Module Enters Final Phase Before Artemis Gateway Launch

description: The EZIE mission is shaping up to be a breakthrough in space weather research. Launched in March 2025, its three satellites are now orbiting Earth and collecting data on auroral electrojets, massive energy currents near the poles. Scientists believe the results could lead to better forecasting tools and stronger, safer satellite systems.
title: NASA's New Satellite Duo Begins Tracking Mysterious Auroral Electrojets

description: Researchers have developed microrobots that can dynamically change shape and move across land and air, opening new possibilities for exploration, rescue, medical devices, and virtual reality.
title: New Shape-Shifting Microrobots Can Walk, Fly, and More: Everything You Need to Know

description: A new study reveals Jupiter’s monster storms create mushballs—giant hailstones made of ammonia and water. This discovery explains the puzzling absence of ammonia in the planet’s upper atmosphere and suggests similar processes might be happening on gas giants across the universe.
title: New Study Reveals How Jupiter’s Storms Hide Ammonia

description: Eric Trump has reportedly announced that the USD1 stablecoin has been picked as the mode of payment for MGX’s purchase of a minority stake in Binance. The announcement was made at the ongoing Token2049 event in Dubai on Thursday, May 1.
title: Trump-Backed USD1 Stablecoin Chosen to Back MGX’s $2 Billion Binance Stake Deal: Report

description: Visa has partnered with Bridge to let developers build on its platform offer stablecoin-linked Visa cards to their users. Both companies shared official announcements on the development on April 30. They said that the main aim of this deal is to introduce stablecoins as legitimate payment options for day-to-day purchases.
title: Visa Partners Stripe-Owned Bridge to Launch Stablecoin Payment Cards: Details

description: Amazon is offering some great discounts and deals on popular TWS on its platform. Moreover, you can get great deals from popular brands like JBL, Samsung, Sony, Senheisser, Bose, and more. In this article, we will be taking a closer look at such popular deals on TWS. So, without further ado, let’s get started.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025: Best Deals on TWS Earbuds

description: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 is here, bringing price cuts and other offers on a wide range of consumer electronics. From smartphones, laptops to TVs and refrigerators, buyers can take advantage of hefty discounts on products across various categories. If you’re eyeing an affordable option, then there are discounts on budget smartphones during the sale.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025: Best Offers on Budget Smartphones

description: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 is the e-commerce giant’s summer-focused sale event, which commenced on Thursday at noon for all users of the platform. During the ongoing sale, buyers can find several offers on consumer electronics devices, smart home devices, computers, and smartphones. Those planning to buy a new gaming laptop can find a wide variety of options from major brands such as Acer, Lenovo, Asus, HP, and MSI.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025: Best Offers on Gaming Laptops

description: Ripple has offered to acquire USDC-issuer Circle for $4 billion (roughly Rs. 33,843 crore) to $5 billion (roughly Rs. 42,300 crore) but the offer was deemed too low and rejected. While Ripple remains interested in Circle, it hasn’t decided whether to make another offer.
title: Ripple Offered to Buy Stablecoin Rival Circle or Up to $5 Billion

description: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 kicked off today for all users in India. It brings lucrative deals on a wide range of products including smartphones, tablets, laptops, TVs, and other home appliances. Smartphones, in particular, can be purchased with discounts at relatively lower rates compared to their usual prices. If you’re eyeing a mid-range smartphone which delivers top-notch performance while also offering a good value for money, this year's Amazon Great Summer Sale has plenty of options to go for.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025: Best Offers on Mid-Range Smartphones

description: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 went live for all users of the platform on Thursday at noon. The e-commerce giant opened the sale exclusively for Prime members at midnight on May 1, offering them a 12-hour early access to the deals and offers. During the sale, buyers can find discounts on a large number of categories, including smartphones, earphones, laptops, smartwatches, home appliances and more.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025: Best Offers on Thin and Light Laptops

description: DeepSeek, the Hangzhou, China-based artificial intelligence (AI) firm, released an updated version of its Prover model on Wednesday. Dubbed DeepSeek-Prover-V2, it is a highly specialised model that focuses on proving formal mathematical theorems. The large language model (LLM) uses the Lean 4 programming language to check if the mathematical proofs are logically consistent by analysing each step independently.
title: DeepSeek Prover V2, an Open-Source Mathematics-Focused AI Model, Released

description: We have the Samsung Galaxy A55 and Samsung Galaxy M06 from the brand, offering a compelling option for the customers in their respective price segments. The Galaxy A55 is a mid-range powerhouse packed with advanced features, while the Galaxy M06 brings reliable performance on a budget. Here are five reasons why you should consider the Galaxy A55 and Galaxy M06 during the Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025.
title: Samsung Galaxy A55 and M06: Five Reasons Why You Should Pick These During Amazon Great Summer Sale

description: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 sale is now live for all shoppers in India, 12 hours after it commenced in early access exclusively for Prime members. It brings discounts on products across different categories, from smartphones and tablets to TVs and other home appliances. The sale is a great opportunity for shoppers who’ve been wanting to upgrade to a premium smartphone. Handsets from top brands such as Apple, Samsung, and Xiaomi are currently listed with discounts of up to 40 percent.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025: Best Offers on Premium Smartphones

description: This weekend, OTT is ready to introduce a fresh set of new releases, including movies and web series. The list includes one of the most anticipated biographies of Costao Fernandes, while Robinhood will expose the journey of a man transforming from stealing to protecting a high-profile client. This week, a French animated movie will be worth watching with family. There’s a lot to add to your watch list.
title: OTT Releases This Week (April 28 - May 4): Bromance, Costao, Kull, Robinhood, and More

description: Amazon is offering great deals on air conditioners, refrigerators, and washing machines. Moreover, customers can also get the best discounts on popular brands like Samsung, Godrej, Panasonic, Daikin, LG, Bosch, and more. So, if you are looking for some best deals, then you have to come to the right place.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025: Best Deals on Home Appliances

description: Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai told a judge that the DoJ's plan to share Google's search data with rivals would be a “de facto” divestiture of the company’s search engine. Pichai was called to testify as part of a three-week trial aimed at determining how Google should restore competition to online search.
title: Google’s Pichai Says US Fix Is ‘De Facto’ Spinoff of Search

description: Apple violated a court order requiring it to open up the App Store to third-party payment options and must stop charging commissions on purchases outside its software marketplace, a federal judge said.
title: Apple Dealt Stinging Court Defeat on App Store Sales Commissions

description: Crypto enthusiasts descended on Dubai on Wednesday for the TOKEN2049 conference, which is expected to attract around 15,000 people. Speakers at the two-day event in the desert city include chief executives at some of the world's major crypto firms, the head of digital assets at BlackRock and Goldman Sachs, as well as the US president's son, Eric Trump, who is set to take the stage on Thursday.
title: Crypto Industry Descends on Dubai as Trump Euphoria Recedes

description: Google is expanding the artificial intelligence (AI)-powered native image editing feature to the Gemini app. Announced on Wednesday, this new capability will allow users to make specific changes to images without leaving the AI chatbot. This new capability was first unveiled in March within the Google AI Studio platform.
title: Google Is Adding Native Image Editing Capability to the Gemini App

description: Vivo Y19 5G was launched in India on Thursday. It is powered by an octa-core MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor which is complemented by LPDDR4X RAM and eMMC 5.1 storage. The phone sports a 6.74-inch 90Hz screen with a 70 percent coverage of the NTSC colour gamut. Vivo has equipped the Y19 5G with a dual rear camera setup, headlined by a 13-megapixel primary shooter.
title: Vivo Y19 5G with Dimensity 6300 Chipset, 5,500mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Amazon has announced the ninth edition of its biggest sale event of the year, dubbed the Amazon Prime Day Sale 2025, for India and other markets. In line with previous editions, it is expected to be a two-day affair that will be exclusive to Amazon Prime members. Customers will be able to take advantage of price drops on products across a wide range of categories such as smartphones, tablets, laptops, home appliances, fashion, apparel, and beyond.
title: Amazon Prime Day Sale 2025 Announced for July with Discounts on Electronics and More

description: The overall crypto market cap clocked a loss of 0.26 percent in the last 24 hours. While Bitcoin saw a minor loss, Ether logged a small gain on Thursday, May 1. The majority of altcoins reflected price dips influenced by unfavourable US economic indicators. Analysts do, however, believe that the market sentiment is optimistic.
title: Bitcoin Trades Close to $95,000, Majority Altcoins See Price Reduction as Market Consolidates

description: Brown Heart is a compelling documentary spotlighting the surge of heart issues in India. Produced by Drs. Nirmal and Renu Joshi, it features expert advice, patient stories, and celebrity voices. The film streams on JioHotstar from May 3, 2025, aiming to raise awareness and spark preventive action globally.
title: Brown Heart OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Documentary on India's Heart Disease Crisis Online?

description: Duolingo announced the launch of 148 new language courses on Wednesday. These courses were generated using the company’s native artificial intelligence (AI) systems. The ed-tech learning platform introduced these new courses just days after the company CEO revealed shift to an AI-first strategy. These new courses were created within a year and they more than double the platform’s total offerings.
title: Duolingo Launches 148 AI-Powered Courses Following AI-First Strategy Shift

description: Directed by Ting Poo, Lee Soo Man: The King of K-pop is a documentary film that revolves around the life of Lee Soo Man, and glorifies his visions and bold moves to bring Korean industry achieve global recognition. The film will stream from 13th May 2025 only on Prime Video.
title: Lee Soo Man: The King of K-Pop OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Kooman is the story of an honest constable disliked by his colleagues and annoyed by his villagers. He is praised for his observant skills and for finding clues. It is when the new CI insults him, and he opts to take revenge and takes the bad road. However, his seniors ensure he is cared for by providing medical assistance.
title: Malayalam Thriller Kooman Now Streaming in Hindi on UltraPlay

description: Samsung's Galaxy Buds3 series steps up to meet that moment, combining everyday practicality with next-gen innovation.
title: Galaxy Buds3 Series: The Tech Behind Samsung’s Most Advanced Earbuds Yet

description: Google announced the expansion of the Audio Overviews feature in NotebookLM on Tuesday. The artificial intelligence (AI) feature can create an engaging podcast-style audio discussion on any topic, as long as a source is added to a note. Audio Overviews feature two AI hosts, a male and a female voice, who discuss the topic, react to it, and contextualise the information in a conversational manner.
title: Google Expands NotebookLM’s Audio Overviews Feature in More Than 50 Languages

description: Google is said to be on the verge of striking a deal with Apple to bring Gemini integration on iPhone. According to a report, this move will make Gemini available as an artificial intelligence (AI) assistant option on Apple’s devices, helping the native voice-based assistant, Siri, deliver responses to more complex queries. It is reported that Gemini on iPhone could become available by the end of the year.
title: Google Reportedly in Talks to Bring Gemini Integration to iPhone by the End of This Year

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge’s arrival was first teased at Galaxy Unpacked in January and although the company gave us a glimpse of it at the MWC 2025, the phone is yet to see the light of day. But , that may soon change. As per a tipster’s claims, the upcoming handset could be launched this month. In a separate development, a report suggests that the Galaxy S25 Edge could debut with the same primary camera as the top-of-the-line Galaxy S25 Ultra.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Launch Date Teased; May Debut With Same Main Camera as Galaxy S25 Ultra
